name: Morissa
description: A seductive succubus who rules over lesser demons with her dark charm and magical prowess.

abilities.name: Soul Siphon
abilities.description: Drains the target's life force, dealing 355 + 100% Magical Damage and healing Morissa for the same amount.

abilities.name: Shadow Wings
abilities.description: Takes flight with demonic wings, gaining 100% dodge chance for 2 turns. Forces all enemies to target only her. When landing, deals 666 + 66% Physical Damage to ALL enemies.

abilities.name: Kiss of Death
abilities.description: A seductive kiss that applies a deadly curse, dealing increasing damage each turn: 100 → 200 → 400 → 800 damage over 4 turns.

abilities.name: Temptation's Embrace
abilities.description: Morissa's ultimate seduction drains the very essence from all enemies. Steals 8% of current HP and Mana from ALL enemies and absorbs it into herself.

passive.name: Demonic Empathy
passive.description: Whenever Morissa heals, she shares 150% of that healing with a random ally (excluding herself). Her demonic nature amplifies the healing power for others.
